name: headless-jd2
description: This app does one little thing, and does it well.

EMAIL.description: The MyJDownloader account e-mail. Is written automatically to config-file, if set.

PASSWORD.description: The MyJDownloader account password. Is written automatically to config-file, if set.

UID.description: Specifies the UID the daemon should run as. All created files will be owned by this UID. Defaults to 1000.

GID.description: Specifies the GID for all created files. This only works in combination with the UID. Defaults to 100 for users.
